label: idValue
comment: The value of the identifier within the scheme (eg 90664869327)

domainIncludes.comment: An identifier of a party, product, or facility that is defined by an identifier scheme and idenfier value.
The ID and Name of an organisation. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a facility. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a location. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
The ID and Name of a product. Used for lightweight links from other classes.
